item.title: Truck of radioactive material stolen
item.description: A truck carrying a dangerous radioactive source used in medical treatment has been stolen in Mexico, the International Atomic Energy Agency said Wednesday.
item.ExtractedText: Mexico reports theft of truck with radioactive material By Holly Yan and Christine Theodorou, CNN December 4, 2013 -- Updated 0943 GMT (1743 HKT) (CNN) -- A truck carrying a dangerous radioactive source used in medical treatment has been stolen in Mexico, the International Atomic Energy Agency said Wednesday. Mexican authorities said the truck, which was transporting the cobalt-60 teletherapy source from a hospital in Tijuana to a radioactive waste storage center, was stolen in Tepojaco, near Mexico City, on Monday.
